mdRecord.dcterms:title: Green Martin Cemetery, Little River District
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Located on Stonewall Rd .7 miles south of its intersection with Daniels Run NE. The closest address is 3045 Stonewall Rd. NE It is located behind a house that sits in the woods. You can't drive to this site, so be prepared to park and hike in deep woods to the cemetery site. N 37 02.202 W 080 16.254
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
